medi:segment.name: Beginning of message
medi:segment.medi:documentation: BGM, A segment identifying the function of the message (details on the worker's insurance history) and, if necessary, the number of the message.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment indicating the date of preparation of the message.

medi:segment.name: Processing information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: GEI, A segment indicating the type of process the message is belonging to.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 1: A group of segments identifying a previous message sent regarding the person.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment identifying the reference of a previously sent or received message related to the current message (for instance, the reference of a received SSREGW message to which the current message is answering).

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment indicating the date of preparation of the previous message whose reference is given in the above RFF segment.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 2: A group of segments identifying the parties and giving the worker's insurance number for each party.

medi:segment.name: Party identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PNA, A segment identifying names of the parties, and their functions relevant to a Worker's insurance history message (sending institution, receiving institution, ...).

medi:segment.name: Address
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ADR, A segment indicating the country of the party.

medi:segment.name: Related identification numbers
medi:segment.medi:documentation: GIR, A segment indicating the Insurance or identification numbers of the worker in the country identified in the related ADR segment.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 3: A group of segments used to describe a period of insurance.

medi:segment.name: Index details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: IND, A segment giving the index value relevant to the period described in the current group.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment indicating dates related to the period (starting and/or ending dates, year of reference, ...) and duration of a period of insurance.

medi:segment.name: Contribution details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: COT, A segment describing the social regulations applied during this period of insurance (scheme, nature or type of insurance).

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 4: A group of segments describing the insured person's employment during this period of insurance.

medi:segment.name: Employment details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: EMP, A segment giving details on the job.

medi:segment.name: Party identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PNA, A segment indicating the name of the employer.

medi:segment.name: Address
medi:segment.medi:documentation:
ADR, A segment indicating the address of the employer.
4.1.2 Detail section
Information to be provided in the Detail section:

medi:segment.name: Section control
medi:segment.medi:documentation: UNS, A mandatory service segment placed before the first user segment in the detail section to avoid segment collision.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 5: A group of segments identifying the worker and his relatives and giving related information.

medi:segment.name: Party identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PNA, A segment giving a person's surnames and forenames and his function in the message (worker, worker's mother, father, spouse).

medi:segment.name: Nationality
medi:segment.medi:documentation: NAT, A segment indicating the nationality of the person identified in the related PNA segment.

medi:segment.name: Document/message details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DOC, A segment specifying the type and the number of an identity document (identity card or passport) belonging to the person identified in the related PNA segment.

medi:segment.name: Address
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ADR, A segment indicating current and previous addresses of the person.

medi:segment.name: Attribute
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ATT, A segment specifying person's natural, professional or academic titles.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 6: A group of segments giving the person's birth or death details.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment indicating date of birth or date of death of the person.

medi:segment.name: Address
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ADR, A segment indicating place of birth or place of death. This segment can be used to identify the country, province or department and city of birth and/or death.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 7: A group of segments giving details on the person's gender and/or marital status.

medi:segment.name: Person demographic information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PDI, A segment specifying the gender, the marital status (married, divorced, ...)of the person identified in the related PNA segment.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment indicating relevant dates related to the civil status (date of marriage, date of divorce, ...).

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 8: A group of segments indicating for each type of social regulation, the total of periods concerned by the regulation.

medi:segment.name: Contribution details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: COT, A segment identifying a regulation.

medi:segment.name: Control total
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CNT, A segment indicating the total duration of periods concerned by the regulation described in the related COT segment.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment giving additional information regarding the insured person.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 9: A group of segments specifying the details of authentication.

medi:segment.name: Authentication result
medi:segment.medi:documentation: AUT, A segment specifying details of any authentication (validation) procedure applied to the SSRECH message.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment identifying the date and where necessary, the time of authentication.
